doc.field: Sylvère Lotringer Papers and Semiotext(e) Archive
Sylvère Lotringer Papers and Semiotext(e) Archive

This subseries contains materials pertaining to the various issues of the Semiotext(e) magazine as well as conferences and events organized by the group. The issues and conferences are arranged chronologically. The three large unfinished projects--the Panic, Japan, and Flesh-Eating Technologies Issues--have been listed by approximate date range and are grouped together. Often there is significant overlap between issues and conferences, with one growing out of the other. In such cases, materials have been placed with the best fit. Among the materials you can expect to find correspondence; notes, clippings and visual source material; manuscripts; layouts; flyers; and press clippings. Materials for each issue or conference is alphabetical by folder description. Material belonging to unidentified projects is found in the last folders in the series.
Sylvère Lotringer Papers and Semiotext(e) Archive
Series II: Semiotext(e) Projects >> Subseries A: Issues and Conferences
